oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: AAL Platform
OSGi
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/C.2 COMPUTER-COMMUNICATION NETWORKS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This document is the second internal report (version B) describing the platform official release. It provides links to the software as well as a brief explanation about the management of the universAAL releases. This document has been prepared by reviewing the internal deliverable ID2.2a with updates concerning the release 3.2.0. Most of the contents have remained the same.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: ReaAL - make it ReAAL. Deliverable D2.2b, 2014.
